Articles.Content:
I have a windows laptop.When I hold Alt+F12 it wont open.After trying to change it to the function key it wont work.To change it I changed LeftAlt to Fn.Sometimes the key would also reset in the settings when I re opened the game.Any help?![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Thanks

-Polar Explorer

> 
> I have a windows laptop.When I hold Alt+F12 it wont open.After trying to change it to the function key it wont work.To change it I changed LeftAlt to Fn.Sometimes the key would also reset in the settings when I re opened the game.Any help?![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Thanks
> -Polar Explorer

See if the alt key works in other applications, as well as other Unity-based games. If so, then file a bug report, possibly with a player.log from pressing Alt then quitting.
Sounds like a support issue. And so, moved.

Thanks for the reply,but the alt key doesnt do anything.The game is programmed to use that but on my Lenovo Ideapad S400 touch,the alt doesnt work,it only activates the functions,in my case the brightness of teh screen.If I try to change the key to something like Fn it will not work and revert to the alt key.

> 
> Thanks for the reply,but the alt key doesnt do anything.The game is programmed to use that but on my Lenovo Ideapad S400 touch,the alt doesnt work,it only activates the functions,in my case the brightness of teh screen.If I try to change the key to something like Fn it will not work and revert to the alt key.

Does the Alt key work in other applications? Are you sure someone hasn't swapped the keycaps on the Alt and Fn keys...?

I agree. I don't know about Lenovo, but the ALT key on all other PC laptops I've used does not control the special functions on the keyboard. Sounds like something else is interfering, such as windows key remapping or incorrect keys.

Try setting the modifier key to something else completely (not the Fn key) and see if that works. If so, then something else is up.

Cheers,

-Claw
